Subject: Test Server Licensing
Description: We have an Endpoint Protector test server which we use only for server updates/upgrades prior to rolling out to production. The current Device Control licensing on the test server is expiring soon, which is not needed. Will server updates still be available without any active module licenses?
What_We_Know__c:

- Customer asked if they needed a license to continue updating their test server
- Reached out to Team Lead and Sara Hall
- Added Customer Success Team to email thread
- Customer Success mailed customer an extension license
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer had question regarding test server licensing ending
Customer Success was able to issue a temp license over to customer
